name: Butter Chicken Pyramid
description:
The fox decided to go into the pyramid, which was inhabited by chickens and butter shoters who would attack you. Your task is to get to the ugly butter boss and defeat him. You can breathe fire, but you will take damage if you don't stop.

Controls:
"Left" & "Right" Arrow keys - Walk
"Z" key - Jump
"X" key - Fireball
"C" key - Firebreath
"Up" Arrow key - Use doors
"F11" Key - Fullscreen On/Off

Team that created the game:

Misha Flash (Coder, Level-Designer, Game-Designer, Tester)

VoidMan (Spriter)

Blaze Games (Tester)

Ruby_Prodakshen (Spriter)

Game created for Jame Gam #25

Made with Construct 3 

Sounds from freesound.org
